mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (USER_ID,LOCATION_NAME, LOCATION_ID,TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, CATEGORY_ID, STATUS, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, BOARD_DATE, PRICE_SUGGEST_YN, PULL_YN, VIEW_COUNT, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES (#{userId},#{locationName}, #{locationId},#{title},#{content},#{price},#{categoryId},#{status},#{regDate},#{modDate}, #{boardDate}, #{priceSuggestYN}, #{pullYN}, #{viewCount}, #{latitude},#{longitude})
